author: RTÉ News
title: HSE to double Covid-19 test capacity
description: The Health Service Executive has said the capacity to test for the cornavirus will be doubled from this week, to around 4,500 tests a day.
content:
The Health Service Executive has said the capacity to test for the cornavirus will be doubled from this week, to around 4,500 tests a day. 
A network of laboratories and 50 community test centres have been set up across the country. 
The HSE said it has man… [+1043 chars]
